languages.text: "Будет исполнено, Ваша Светлость. Семейство Зауэрбэк во главе с Махарием, Региной и Геткой Зауэрбэком обвиняется в ереси. Приказом Вольного Торговца весь род приговаривается к смерти. Приговор привести в исполнение немедленно".

traits.locale_text: "Будет исполнено, Ваша Светлость". {n}Абеляр внимательно осматривает семейство Зауэрбек.{/n} "Семейство Зауэрбек во главе с Махарием, Региной и Геткой Зауэрбеком обвиняется в ереси. Приказом Вольного Торговца весь род приговаривается к смерти. Приговор привести в исполнение немедленно".

languages.text: "It will be done, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Macharius Sauerback, Regina Sauerback, and Hetka Sauerback, as well as the rest of House Sauerback, have been found guilty of heresy. By the order of the Rogue Trader, the entire house is hereby sentenced to death. The sentence is to be carried out immediately."
languages.original_text: "Будет исполнено, Ваша Светлость. Семейство Зауэрбэк во главе с Махарием, Региной и Геткой Зауэрбэком обвиняется в ереси. Приказом Вольного Торговца весь род приговаривается к смерти. Приговор привести в исполнение немедленно".

traits.locale_text: "It will be done, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Macharius Sauerback, Regina Sauerback and Hetka Sauerback as well as the rest of House Saureback are accused of heresy. By the order of the Rogue Trader, the entire family is hereby sentenced to death. Begin the execution at once."

"It will be done, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Macharius Sauerback, Regina Sauerback and Hetka Sauerback as well as the rest of House Saureback are accused of heresy. By the order of the Rogue Trader, the entire family is hereby sentenced to death. Begin the execution at once."

"It will be done, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Macharius Sauerback, Regina Sauerback, and Hetka Sauerback, as well as the rest of House Sauerback, have been found guilty of heresy. By the order of the Rogue Trader, the entire house is hereby sentenced to death. The sentence is to be carried out immediately."

"It will be done, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Macharius Sauerback, Regina Sauerback, and Hetka Sauerback, as well as the rest of House Sauerback, have been found guilty of heresy. By the order of the Rogue Trader, the entire house is hereby sentenced to death. The sentence is to be carried out immediately."

languages.text: 「お任せください、陛下。マハリウス・ザウアーバック、レジーナ・ザウアーバック、ヘトカ・ザウアーバック、そして他のザウアーバック家の者ども一同は異端の罪で有罪となる。自由開拓者の命を受け、これにより一族全員に死刑を宣告する。刑はただちに執行される」
languages.original_text: "It will be done, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Macharius Sauerback, Regina Sauerback, and Hetka Sauerback, as well as the rest of House Sauerback, have been found guilty of heresy. By the order of the Rogue Trader, the entire house is hereby sentenced to death. The sentence is to be carried out immediately."

traits.locale_text: 「お任せください、陛下。マハリウス・ザウアーバック、レジーナ・ザウアーバック、ヘトカ・ザウアーバック、そして他のザウアーバック家の者ども一同は異端の罪で有罪となる。自由開拓者の命を受け、これにより一族全員に死刑を宣告する。刑はただちに執行される」

languages.text: “遵命，大人。马卡里乌斯·苏尔贝克、蕾吉娜·苏尔贝克、赫特卡·苏尔贝克，以及苏尔贝克家族余党都犯下了异端罪行，奉行商浪人之命判处其死刑，立即执行。”
languages.original_text: "It will be done, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Macharius Sauerback, Regina Sauerback, and Hetka Sauerback, as well as the rest of House Sauerback, have been found guilty of heresy. By the order of the Rogue Trader, the entire house is hereby sentenced to death. The sentence is to be carried out immediately."

traits.locale_text: “遵命，大人。马卡里乌斯·苏尔贝克、蕾吉娜·苏尔贝克、赫特卡·苏尔贝克，以及苏尔贝克家族余党都犯下了异端罪行，奉行商浪人之命判处其死刑，立即执行。”

languages.text: « C'est comme si c'était fait, Votre Seigneurie. Macharius Sauerback, Régina Sauerback et Hetka Sauerback ainsi que l'ensemble de la maison Sauerback ont été convaincus d'hérésie. Sur ordre {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, tous les membres de la famille sont condamnés à mort et la sentence va être exécutée sur-le-champ. »
languages.original_text: "It will be done, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Macharius Sauerback, Regina Sauerback, and Hetka Sauerback, as well as the rest of House Sauerback, have been found guilty of heresy. By the order of the Rogue Trader, the entire house is hereby sentenced to death. The sentence is to be carried out immediately."

traits.locale_text: « C'est comme si c'était fait, Votre Seigneurie. Macharius Sauerback, Régina Sauerback et Hetka Sauerback ainsi que l'ensemble de la maison Sauerback ont été convaincus d'hérésie. Sur ordre {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, tous les membres de la famille sont condamnés à mort et la sentence va être exécutée sur-le-champ. »

languages.text: «Así se hará, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Macharius Sauerback, Regina Sauerback y Hetka Sauerback, así como el resto de la casa Sauerback, son culpables de herejía. Por orden {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente, toda la casa queda sentenciada a muerte. La sentencia se ejecutará de inmediato».
languages.original_text: "It will be done, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Macharius Sauerback, Regina Sauerback, and Hetka Sauerback, as well as the rest of House Sauerback, have been found guilty of heresy. By the order of the Rogue Trader, the entire house is hereby sentenced to death. The sentence is to be carried out immediately."

traits.locale_text: «Así se hará, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Macharius Sauerback, Regina Sauerback y Hetka Sauerback, así como el resto de la casa Sauerback, son culpables de herejía. Por orden {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente, toda la casa queda sentenciada a muerte. La sentencia se ejecutará de inmediato».

languages.text: "Wird erledigt, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Macharius Sauerback, Regina Sauerback und Hetka Sauerback sowie der gesamte Rest von Haus Sauerback wird der Ketzerei für schuldig befunden. Auf Befehl {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} wird hiermit das gesamte Haus zum Tode verurteilt. Die Strafe wird sofort vollzogen!"
languages.original_text: "It will be done, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Macharius Sauerback, Regina Sauerback, and Hetka Sauerback, as well as the rest of House Sauerback, have been found guilty of heresy. By the order of the Rogue Trader, the entire house is hereby sentenced to death. The sentence is to be carried out immediately."

traits.locale_text: "Ist so gut wie erledigt, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Macharius Sauerback, Regina Sauerback und Hetka Sauerback sowie dem Rest von Haus Sauerback wird Ketzerei vorgeworfen. Auf Befehl {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} wird hiermit die gesamte Familie zum Tode verurteilt. Führt die Hinrichtung unverzüglich aus."

languages.text: "Başüstüne {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Macharius Sauerback, Regina Sauerback, Hetka Sauerback ve hanenin kalanı; kâfirlikten suçlu bulunmuştur. Her bir hane mensubu, Hür Tacir'in emriyle idam cezasına çarptırılmıştır. Ceza tez elden infaz edilecektir."
languages.original_text: "It will be done, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Macharius Sauerback, Regina Sauerback, and Hetka Sauerback, as well as the rest of House Sauerback, have been found guilty of heresy. By the order of the Rogue Trader, the entire house is hereby sentenced to death. The sentence is to be carried out immediately."

traits.locale_text: "Başüstüne {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Macharius Sauerback, Regina Sauerback, Hetka Sauerback ve hanenin kalanı kâfirlikten suçlu bulunmuştur. Hür Tacir'in emriyle hanenin tamamı idam cezasına çarptırılmıştır. Ceza derhâl infaz edilecektir."
